folder: Richmond Road & St. Patricks Place, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Road - St. Patricks Place
text:
664 Richmond Road, adjoining the S.E. corner of St. Patricks Place, showing the Richmond Engine Company No. 1, a volunteer organization. The view is eastward from St. Patricks Place.

June 13, 1927

P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Road & St. Patricks Place, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Road - St. Patricks Place
text:
672 Richmond Road, at the S. E. corner of St. Patricks Place. Shown is the rear of the house at the above address, seen from Center Street (right) and St. Patricks Place. It was owned by D. L. Stevens in 1874 and by the Prier family from 1898 to 1917. Dates refer to maps on which the owners' names appear.

May 6, 1936

P. L. Sperr
